name: Midnight Saginaw Obituaries
description: Changes the color scheme of the Public Libraries of Saginaw Obituary Index to be less blinding for late-night viewing.
additional_info:
Since this is a site that uses very old HTML practices and still uses frames (not advisable), not much can be done about the structuring of the page with a simple CSS style.

This style should work with most modern browsers. Please let me know if further compatibility is needed.

<b>Version 1.0<b/>
 - Style created using a series of complex invert filters
<b>Version 2.0<b/>
 - Simplified style to reflect new website update.
